title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 300.3 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 300.3 - Scope

State Regulations

These standards provide the basic performance objectives to
be met in planning and designing all facilities to be constructed, rehabilitated and improved for State University. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
300.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
